notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, V.V.K., A.S. (Andrey Shemshura), R.K., and S.S. (Saleta Sierra); Data Curation, E.H., E.K., and V.D.C.; Formal analysis, M.S. and S.S. (Saleta Sierra); Funding acquisition, R.K.; Investigation, M.S., V.V.K., V.H.M., A.S. (Andrey Shemshura), and K.H.; Methodology, M.S. and K.H.; Project administration, S.S. (Saleta Sierra); Resources, V.V.K., A.S. (Andrey Shemshura), S.S. (Sergey Saukhat), D.K., A.S. (Alexandr Suladze), and T.T.; Software, M.B. (Michael Böhm); Supervision, S.S. (Saleta Sierra); Validation, E.H., E.K., V.D.C., and R.K.; Visualization, M.S. and S.S. (Saleta Sierra); Writing – original draft, M.S. and S.S. (Saleta Sierra); Writing – review and editing, V.V.K., A.S. (Anders Sönnerborg), M.Z., M.B. (Marina Bobkova), and S.S. (Saleta Sierra). All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
